Verses: 1 dhevan Pesich Solliya Sagala Vaarththaigalumaavana:
2 unnai Adimaiththana Veedaagiya Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Naane.
3 ennaiyandri Unakku Vere Dhevargal Undaayirukkavendaam.
4  Mele Vaanaththilum, Keezhe Boomiyilum, Boomiyinkeezhth Thanneerilum Undaayirukkiravaigalukku Oppaana Oru Soroobaththaiyaagilum Yaadhoru Vikkiragaththaiyaagilum Nee Unakku Undaakka Vendaam;

5 nee Avaigalai Namaskarikkavum Sevikkavum Vendaam; Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaraayirukkira Naan Erichchalulla Dhevanaayirundhu, Ennaip Pagaikkiravargalaik Kuriththup Pidhaakkaludaiya Akkiramaththaip Pillaigalidaththil Moondraam Naangaam Thalaimuraimattum Visaarikkiravaraayirukkiren.
6 ennidaththil Anbukoorndhu, En Karpanaigalaik Kaikkollugiravargalukko Aayiram Thalaimuraimattum Irakkam Seygiravaraayirukkiren.
7 un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Naamaththai Veenile Vazhangaadhiruppaayaaga; Karththar Thammudaiya Naamaththai Veenile Vazhangugiravanaith Thandiyaamal Vidaar.
8 oivunaalaip Parisuththamaai Aasarikka Ninaippaayaaga;
9 aarunaalum Nee Velaiseydhu, Un Kiriyaigalaiyellaam Nadappippaayaaga;

10 ezhaamnaalo Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Oivunaal; Adhile Neeyaanaalum, Un Kumaaranaanaalum, Un Kumaaraththiyaanaalum, Un Velaikkaaranaanaalum, Un Velaikkaariyaanaalum, Un Miruga Jeevanaanaalum, Un Vaasalgalil Irukkira Anniyanaanaalum, Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyavendaam.

11 karththar Aarunaalaikkulle Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Samuththiraththaiyum Avaigalilulla Ellaavatraiyum Undaakki, Ezhaamnaalile Oindhirundhaar; Aagaiyaal, Karththar Oivunaalai Aaseervadhiththu, Adhaip Parisuththamaakkinaar.
12 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kodukkira Dhesaththile Un Naatkal Neediththiruppadharku, Un Thagappanaiyum Un Thaayaiyum Ganampannuvaayaaga.
13 kolai Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga.
14  Vibachaaram Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga.
15 kalavu Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga.
16 piranukku Virodhamaagap Poisaatchi Sollaadhiruppaayaaga.

17 piranudaiya Veettai Ichchiyaadhiruppaayaaga; Piranudaiya Manaiviyaiyum, Avanudaiya Velaikkaaranaiyum, Avanudaiya Velaikkaariyaiyum, Avanudaiya Erudhaiyum, Avanudaiya Kazhudhaiyaiyum, Pinnum Piranukkulla Yaadhondraiyum Ichchiyaadhiruppaayaaga Endraar.
18 janangal Ellaarum Idimuzhakkangalaiyum Minnalgalaiyum Ekkaalach Saththaththaiyum Malai Pugaigiradhaiyum Kandaargal; Adhaik Kandu, Janangal Pinvaangi, Dhooraththile Nindru,
19 moseyai Nokki: Neer Engalode Pesum, Naangal Ketpom; Dhevan Engalode Pesaadhiruppaaraaga, Pesinaal Naangal Seththuppovom Endraargal.

20 mose Janangalai Nokki: Bayappadaadhirungal; Ungalaich Sodhippadhargaagavum, Neengal Paavamseyyaadhabadikkuth Thammaip Patrum Bayam Ungal Mugaththirku Munbaaga Iruppadharkaagavum, Dhevan Ezhundharulinaar Endraan.
21 janangal Dhooraththile Nindraargal; Mose, Dhevan Irundha Kaarmegaththukkuch Sameebamaaich Serndhaan.
22 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Naan Vaanaththilirundhu Ungalode Pesinen Endru Kandeergal.
23 neengal Enakku Oppaaga Velliyinaale Dheyvangalaiyum Ponninaale Dheyvangalaiyum Ungalukku Undaakkave Vendaam.

24 manninaale Balibeedaththai Enakku Undaakki, Adhinmel Un Aadugalaiyum Un Maadugalaiyum Sarvaanga Thaganabaliyaagavum Samaadhaanabaliyaagavum Seluththuvaayaaga; Naan En Naamaththaip Pirasthaabappaduththum Endha Sthaanaththilum Unnidaththil Vandhu, Unnai Aaseervadhippen.
25 enakkuk Kallinaal Balibeedaththai Undaakkavendumaagil, Adhai Vettina Kallugalaal Kattavendaam; Adhinmel Uliyittavudane, Adhai Asusippaduththuvaai.
26 en Balibeedaththinmel Un Nirvaanam Kaanappadaadhabadikku, Padigalaal Adhinmel Eravum Vendaam.
